Article.ArticleTitle: Psychological distress and supportive care utilization in medical assistance in dying: A retrospective observational cohort study.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Declaration of competing interest ML reports income as the project lead and working group chair of the Canadian MAiD Curriculum, as well as payment for expert testimony. No other competing interests were declared.
